title: Bug 15899: Close All Saved does not work consistently
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not close all opened editors as expected.
OB: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, after closing all editors, when I create a new file f1.txt and select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
EB: After closing all editors, when I create a new file f1.txt and select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all opened editors should be closed.
SR:
1. Open the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Close all currently opened editors.
3. Create a new file f1.txt.
4. From the file menu, select 'Close All Saved'.
